sine.gloss: the ratio of the opposite side to the hypotenuse in a right triangle

cosine.gloss: the ratio of the adjacent side to the hypotenuse in a right triangle

tangent.gloss: the ratio of the opposite side to the adjacent side in a right triangle

pythagorean_identity.gloss: the fundamental relationship between sine and cosine

angle_sum_sine.gloss: the sine of a sum of two angles
angle_sum_sine.exec: lambda math, a, b: math.sin(a)*math.cos(b) + math.cos(a)*math.sin(b)

angle_sum_cosine.gloss: the cosine of a sum of two angles
angle_sum_cosine.exec: lambda math, a, b: math.cos(a)*math.cos(b) - math.sin(a)*math.sin(b)

angle_sum_tangent.gloss: the tangent of a sum of two angles
angle_sum_tangent.exec: lambda math, a, b: (math.tan(a) + math.tan(b)) / (1 - math.tan(a)*math.tan(b))

double_angle_sine.gloss: the sine of twice an angle

double_angle_cosine.gloss: the cosine of twice an angle

double_angle_tangent.gloss: the tangent of twice an angle

radians_to_degrees.gloss: converting an angle from radians to degrees

degrees_to_radians.gloss: converting an angle from degrees to radians

law_of_sines.gloss: a relationship between sides and angles of any triangle
law_of_sines.formula: a / sin(A) = b / sin(B) = c / sin(C)
law_of_sines.exec: lambda math, a, A, b, B: (a / math.sin(A), b / math.sin(B))

law_of_cosines.gloss: a generalization of the Pythagorean theorem for any triangle
law_of_cosines.exec: lambda math, a, b, C: (a**2 + b**2 - 2*a*b*math.cos(C))**0.5

unit_circle_coordinates.gloss: the coordinates of a point on the unit circle
